import { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from 'react'; import { Transition } from '@headlessui/react'; import { useResizeDetector } from 'react-resize-detector'; // Im assuming we are gonna need router links in the Nav bar, if we dont remove this import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Nav = () => { const [showMobileNav, setShowMobileNav] = useState(false); const [showUserDropdown, setShowUserDropdown] = useState(false); // keep track of window resizing const { width, height, ref } = useResizeDetector(); // toggles mobile nav off when sm size reached if (width > 640) { if (showMobileNav) { setShowMobileNav(false); } } return (

BU Nexus

Planner Reviews
{(ref) => (
setShowUserDropdown(!showUserDropdown)} to="/profile/" className="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100" role="menuitem">Your Profile setShowUserDropdown(!showUserDropdown)} to="/settings/" className="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100" role="menuitem">Settings localStorage.removeItem('token')} to="/test/" className="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100" role="menuitem">Sign out
)}
Planner Reviews
) } export default Nav;
